title: The gear I love!
elaboration: The tools I work with shape how I move, practice, and perform. Iâ€™m grateful to be supported by companies whose values align with care, durability, and intentional design.

sponsors.title: Flowtoys
sponsors.elaboration: Reliable, thoughtfully designed props built for longevity and adaptability. Flowtoys equipment has been a steady part of my flow arts thanks to the durability, customer care, and love I have received from the flowtoys family.

figure.alt: Mustafa flowing at night with a Flow Toys wand

sponsors.title: Derp Gear
sponsors.elaboration: Handmade flow and juggling gear created with care, creativity, and good vibes at heart. Kristina makes leviwands, contact wands, hoods, and custom pieces that emphasize joy, play, and personal expression in flow arts.

figure.alt: Mustafa smiling in a tie-dye shirt holding a Derp Gear wand

sponsors.title: MoodHoops
sponsors.elaboration: LED props that balance precision, play, and visual clarity. MoodHoops gear supports both my practice and performance work, allowing light to function as rhythm rather than distraction.

figure.alt: Mustafa illuminated by the blue glow of a MoodHoops wand
